description: I make use of HTML as the core maker for my web projects and to markup and give context to websites and web applications I am building.

To beautify and give life to my web projects, I make use of CSS to make sure that the end user of my web projects receives comfort and as well as great user experience while making use of the product.
I made use of JavaScript to give my websites and web applications functionality and to further increase the end-users user experience.
I started using Angular in October 2017 and since then I have been using it for creating dynamic websites and single page web applications.
I make use of react for developing heavy single page application that require fast and efficient page rendering using their engines .
